Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Pavillon Villiers Etoile in Paris (Arc de Triomphe - Palais des Congres), you'll be minutes from Square des Batignolles and close to Arc de Triomphe. This hotel is close to Louvre Museum and Eiffel Tower.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 55 guestrooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and complimentary weekday newspapers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include laundry facilities and an elevator (lift). A shuttle from the hotel to the airport is available for a surcharge.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

With a stay at Pavillon Villiers Etoile in Paris (Arc de Triomphe - Palais des Congres), you'll be minutes from Square des Batignolles and close to Arc de Triomphe. This hotel is close to Louvre Museum and Eiffel Tower.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Square des Batignolles - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Musee Nissim de Camondo - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Parc Monceau - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Place de Clichy - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Jacquemart-Andre Museum - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Moulin Rouge - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Cafe des 2 Moulins - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Museum of Romantic Life - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Printemps Department Store - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Theatre Mogador - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Elysee Palace - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Gustave Moreau Museum - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Theatre la Bruyere - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Rue des Abbessees - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Pinacotheque de Paris - 1.6 km / 1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 22.9 km / 14.2 mi

The preferred airport for Pavillon Villiers Etoile is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
